General.Name: La Savonnerie de Nyons SA
General.Description: La Savonnerie De Nyons manufactures and sells soaps and cosmetics in France. It also offers perfumed sachets, soap holders, magnets, and totes. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Nyons, France.
General.Address: ZA Les Laurons II, Nyons, France, 26110
